level.text: A request for an advisory opinion shall be in writing, signed by the requestor and filed with the General Counsel to the Board of Elections and Ethics.

Upon receipt of a request for an advisory opinion relative to the Campaign Finance Act, the General Counsel shall transmit a copy of the request for an advisory opinion to the Director of Campaign Finance.
A request for an advisory opinion shall contain the following:
The full name, residence address, and telephone number of the requestor; and
A clear and concise statement of the facts relating to the specific transaction or activity which constitute a violation of the law.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 28 D.C. Reg. 2153-54 (May 15, 1981).
